meta_nexara: Nexara - a fast and reliable API for speech transcription. Supports most audio and video formats, easy integration, high accuracy, low price.
hero_title: Легкое распознавание речи для ваших автоматизаций без кода
hero_subtitle: Быстро добавьте распознавание речи в свои автоматизации n8n без написания сложного кода.
integration_subtitle: Learn how to integrate Nexara in your n8n pipeline in 3 easy steps
advantages_subtitle: Discover why you should try our API today
advantages_highspeed_subtitle: Transcribe an hour of video in just 15 seconds.
advantages_easyintegration_subtitle: We design for effortless integration into your favorite no-code platforms, starting with n8n. Add powerful transcription to your automations without needing developer skills.
advantages_accuracy_subtitle: Response quality comparable to the world's best models.
advantages_price_subtitle: Up to 6 times cheaper than AssemblyAI or OpenAI.
advantages_russianservice_subtitle: Supports more than 50 languages and can automatically detect the language of the audio.
advantages_flexible_subtitle: Choose On-Premise, dedicated servers, or secure Cloud API.
advantages_functionality_subtitle: Speaker diarization, smart subtitles, and timestamps.
usage_subtitle: Nexara is a versatile tool that can be used by a wide range of users.
usage_step1_subtitle: Create captions and transcripts for your videos.
pricing_subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you
pricing_flexible_point4: Support for various audio and video formats
pricing_enterprise_point4: Several times cheaper than Yandex SpeechKit
cta_subtitle: Try our service and see for yourself.
